articles.title: Lithium deficiency and the onset of Alzheimer’s disease - Nature
articles.description: Lithium has an essential role in the brain and is deficient early in Alzheimer’s disease, which can be recapitulated in mice and treated with a novel lithium salt that restores the physiological level.
